name: Leave The House (Penny's Playtime Chapter 2)
description:
Is He Gone?

Has He Left Yet?

After You Find Yourself Free Of The Nightmare You Just Experienced, You Realize That Something Isn't Right...Where Are Your Parents, And Where Is Penny?

Penny's Playtime Chapter 2 is a point and click horror experience inspired by:

Sister Location

And More!

                                                                        How To Play:

Flashlight:

You are surrounded by darkness! Use your flashlight to see parts of your room and to scare away the potential threat lurking in the shadows...

Mini-Map:

On The Top Left Of The Screen, There is a Mini-map. Use This To Determine Where Exactly You Are In The House.

Items:

To Pick Up An Item, Press E while your cursor is on the item. Items Are important for unlocking doors.

Navigating The House:

Click On Unlocked Doors To Enter The Room, And Press B in a room to Return To The Previous Room.

 Story:

The Story Picks Of Right Where Chapter 1 Left Off...  

You Now Must Escape The House...

                          The Game Includes:

-2 endings and a Bunch of Secrets...

-Free Roaming Gameplay That Lets You Explore Every Corner Of The House!

                               Update List:

1.0- Released!
